source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This video consists of a single, static, breathtaking photograph of a natural landscape. There is no movement in the clip.

The image is a stunning aerial view of Angel Falls in Venezuela, cascading from the top of a massive, flat-topped mountain known as a tepui. The summit of the tepui is covered in vibrant green vegetation and is split by a deep canyon from which the waterfall emerges. The water plummets in a long, slender stream down the immense, sheer cliff face into the dense, verdant rainforest that blankets the valley below and the surrounding mountains stretching into the hazy distance.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback:
1. Say that it seems like Angel Falls in Venezuela rather than being completely certain, as it is hard to verify the exact location. 
2. The shot is not completely static and there is movement; water falls, and the camera itself is moving downwards.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback:
1. Consider stating that the image appears to be of Angel Falls in Venezuela, as it may be challenging to confirm the exact location with absolute certainty.
2. The description of the video as completely static is inaccurate; there is movement in the scene, as the water is visibly falling, and the camera itself is moving downward.
source_caption_data.final_feedback:

2. The description of the video as completely static is inaccurate; there is movement in the scene, as the water is visibly falling, and the camera itself is moving downward.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This video features a breathtaking photograph of what appears to be Angel Falls in Venezuela. The image captures an aerial view of the waterfall cascading from the top of a massive, flat-topped mountain known as a tepui. The summit of the tepui is covered in vibrant green vegetation and is split by a deep canyon from which the waterfall emerges. The water visibly plummets in a long, slender stream down the immense, sheer cliff face into the dense, verdant rainforest that blankets the valley below. The camera moves downward, enhancing the view of the surrounding mountains stretching into the hazy distance.

The summit of the tepui is covered in vibrant green vegetation and is split by a deep canyon from which the waterfall emerges. The water plummets in a long, slender stream down the immense, sheer cliff face into the dense, verdant rainforest that blankets the valley below and the surrounding mountains stretching into the hazy distance.
